description: 2-hour exam with multiple-choice and short/long answer questions covering seminars, laboratory practicals, and tutorials. Conducted online via Inspera during the exam period.
50-minute test assessing knowledge from the first half of the term (skeletal, muscular, cardiovascular, respiratory, digestive systems). Conducted online and in-person during Week 5.
Weekly quizzes during laboratory practicals (6 minutes each, multiple-choice), with the best 6 out of 8 scores counted. Covers weekly lecture and practical content.
50-minute test assessing knowledge from the second half of the term (urinary, reproductive systems, central/peripheral nervous systems, special senses). Conducted online and in-person during Week 10.
